name: Chouon RPG: Ushinawareta Ototoi Mura
summary: Chouon RPG: Ushinawareta Ototoi Mura is an old-style RPG with a unique battle system. In this game, players listen to the sound made by enemies, distinguish its pitch, interval, chord, instrument etc., and then damage them. The goal of this game is to reveal the mystery of Ototoi village from which ghosts of sound appear.
